channel.title: General on Veni, Vidi, Vici
channel.description: Recent content in General on Veni, Vidi, Vici

item.title: A Big, Thank You!
item.author: julie.turner@sympraxisconsulting.com (Julie Turner)
item.description: Yesterday was a huge day for me professionally as I was awarded my first (and hopefully not last) Microsoft MVP Award. It was such a huge honor, and I felt it appropriate to give a shout out here to the Microsoft community for their support. There have been so many great mentors in my life over the years, many of whom I still collaborate with on a regular (if not daily) basis.

item.title: The man with the “bacon covered donut” could not be ignored
item.author: julie.turner@sympraxisconsulting.com (Julie Turner)
item.description: I recently attended a multi-day event at the Microsoft campus in Redmond, WA. Early in the morning and blurry-eyed from battling the time change, I found my way into the event room to see Marc D. Anderson in an aisle seat plugging away at his computer with a mouthwatering bacon covered donut sitting daintily on a paper napkin at his elbow… that, my friends, is a conversation starter! Sometimes in life, things are just obvious really quickly.
